name: Limits

methods.name: getAggregateQueries
methods.description: Returns the number of aggregate queries that have been processed with any SOQL query statement.

methods.name: getLimitAggregateQueries
methods.description: Returns the total number of aggregate queries that can be processed with SOQL query statements.

methods.name: getAsyncCalls
methods.description: Reserved for future use.

methods.name: getLimitAsyncCalls
methods.description: Reserved for future use.

methods.name: getCallouts
methods.description: Returns the number of Web service statements that have been processed.

methods.name: getChildRelationshipsDescribes
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the number of child relationship objects that have been returned.

methods.name: getLimitCallouts
methods.description: Returns the total number of Web service statements that can be processed.

methods.name: getCpuTime
methods.description: Returns the CPU time (in milliseconds) that has been used in the current transaction.

methods.name: getLimitCpuTime
methods.description: Returns the maximum CPU time  (in milliseconds) that can be used in a transaction.

methods.name: getDMLRows
methods.description: Returns the number of records that have been processed with any statement that counts against DML limits, such as DML statements, the Database.emptyRecycleBin method, and other methods.

methods.name: getLimitDMLRows
methods.description: Returns the total number of records that can be processed with any statement that counts against DML limits, such as DML statements, the database.EmptyRecycleBin method, and other methods.

methods.name: getDMLStatements
methods.description: Returns the number of DML statements (such as insert, update or the database.EmptyRecycleBin method) that have been called.

methods.name: getLimitDMLStatements
methods.description: Returns the total number of DML statements or the database.EmptyRecycleBin methods that can be called.

methods.name: getEmailInvocations
methods.description: Returns the number of email invocations (such as sendEmail) that have been called.

methods.name: getLimitEmailInvocations
methods.description: Returns the total number of email invocation (such as sendEmail) that can be called.

methods.name: getFindSimilarCalls
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getSoslQueries. The number of findSimilar methods is no longer a separate limit, but is tracked as the number of SOSL queries issued.

methods.name: getLimitFindSimilarCalls
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getLimitSoslQueries. The number of findSimilar methods is no longer a separate limit, but is tracked as the number of SOSL queries issued.

methods.name: getFutureCalls
methods.description: Returns the number of methods with the future annotation that have been executed (not necessarily completed).

methods.name: getLimitFutureCalls
methods.description: Returns the total number of methods with the future annotation that can be executed (not necessarily completed).

methods.name: getHeapSize
methods.description: Returns the approximate amount of memory (in bytes) that has been used for the heap.

methods.name: getLimitHeapSize
methods.description: Returns the total amount of memory (in bytes) that can be used for the heap.

methods.name: getMobilePushApexCalls
methods.description: Returns the number of Apex calls that have been used by mobile push notifications during the current metering interval.

methods.name: getLimitMobilePushApexCalls
methods.description: Returns the total number of Apex calls that are allowed per transaction for mobile push notifications.

methods.name: getQueries
methods.description: Returns the number of SOQL queries that have been issued.

methods.name: getLimitQueries
methods.description: Returns the total number of SOQL queries that can be issued.

methods.name: getQueryLocatorRows
methods.description: Returns the number of records that have been returned by the Database.getQueryLocator method.

methods.name: getLimitQueryLocatorRows
methods.description: Returns the total number of records that can be returned by the Database.getQueryLocator method.

methods.name: getQueryRows
methods.description: Returns the number of records that have been returned by issuing SOQL queries.

methods.name: getLimitQueryRows
methods.description: Returns the total number of records that can be returned by issuing SOQL queries.

methods.name: getQueueableJobs
methods.description: Returns the number of queueable jobs that have been added to the queue per transaction. A queueable job corresponds to a class that implements the Queueable interface.

methods.name: getLimitQueueableJobs
methods.description: Returns the maximum number of queueable jobs that can be added to the queue per transaction. A queueable job corresponds to a class that implements the Queueable interface.

methods.name: getRunAs
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getDMLStatements.

methods.name: getLimitRunAs
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getLimitDMLStatements.

methods.name: getSavepointRollbacks
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getDMLStatements.

methods.name: getLimitSavepointRollbacks
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getLimitDMLStatements.

methods.name: getSavepoints
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getDMLStatements.

methods.name: getLimitSavepoints
methods.description: Deprecated. Returns the same value as getLimitDMLStatements.

methods.name: getSoslQueries
methods.description: Returns the number of SOSL queries that have been issued.

methods.name: getLimitSoslQueries
methods.description: Returns the total number of SOSL queries that can be issued.

description: Contains methods that return limit information for specific resources.
